short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A set of expansion features for the Empower / Personal Capital web experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Expands the Empower Personal Capital dashboard with two simple but helpful features.

1. Allows for a "private mode" which makes account totals and Net Worth nearly illegible so anyone looking at your screen will not be able to read this information. Great for public spaces.

2. Adds a transaction bookmark feature. Allows you to bookmark a specific transaction so when you are reviewing your transactions you will know when you have reached the point of your last review.
